Class MedicalRecord

java.lang.Object
models.MedicalRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MedicalRecord extends Object implements Serializable
Class representing a medical record of a patient. This class stores personal information, past diagnoses, and treatments of a patient.
See Also:
